snippet.title: Cast Away The Odyssey Demo 0.05 TRAILER | RPG Maker Game
snippet.description:
Follow the creator on Twitter: https://twitter.com/theluigiplayer

Game's Website (still on german): https://ca-to.jimdo.com/

Cast Away The Odyssey is a rpg which is develope by TheLuigiplayer since 2011. It bases on the principle of a dungeon crawler and includes an animated 2d side-scroll combat system and many puzzles to solve. The main protagonist being John Maynard who's stranded after a mysterious accident and now has to flee the island!

TheLuigiplayer on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClo4x8fzsKOjLQCUF4d1j7g
